title: Minna No Nihongo 2 DVD (Second Edition)
description:
The conversation videos for Minna no Nihongo Shokyu I and II are now available in DVD format. The DVDs include recordings of all the conversations found in the main texts. 

By using these DVDs, the learner not only comes to clearly understand under what situation and circumstances the conversations in the book should be used, but also the study goals and content (meaning and function of sentence patterns and expressions) of each lesson.

The DVDs are available both in NTSC and PAL format, and come with a Japanese subtitle option (on or off)
